article: russia 's foreign minister sergey lavrov on monday urged iran to cooperate with the united nations ' nuclear watchdog to end the crisis over its nuclear program , and warned that international sanctions would n't solve the standoff .
abstract: russia urges iran to cooperate with u.n. watchdog warns against sanctions
